scenario_text.value: So...this is where Miyuki and the Master are.
It sure is quiet.

(It’s more than just quiet. The silence in
here is...deafening. It hurts my ears.)

(I don’t understand it. My heart’s pounding
in my chest, and I get this awful feeling...)

(...like something cold and slimy is about to
reach up and grab me by the throat...)

(It’s horrible! I can’t stand it! I thought
I was ready. Now all I want to do is run!)
(Something about this place is...wrong.)
*huff*... *huff*...!
Miu? Miu, what’s wrong?!
Don’t...know... Can’t...breathe...!

Oh no! She’s starting to hyperventilate! Get
her to breathe out more slowly!

Miu, don’t panic! Deep breaths! Take deep
breaths in, and breathe all the way out.

’Kay...!
*inhale*... *exhale*...

Why would Miu just start hyperventilating
like that?

Likely because of the oppressive atmosphere
that fills this place.

Though apparently that’s not all there was to
it...
What do you mean?

Takuma...I don’t like this place at all. It
makes me feel sick...

I can tell a bunch of the Master’s minions
must’ve been here, but I don’t sense them.
Something awful must have happened here.

(Looks like this place is getting to Agumon
and the others, too.)
Hm?
Hey, over there! Isn’t that Miyuki?!
What?!
Huh?! Miyuki!
Miyuki! Are you okay?!

She looks exhausted! We need to hurry up and
save—
Oh, I’m afraid I can’t let you do that.
(Huh?!)
What the—?! Aoi?!
Aoi...
You got here sooner than I expected.
Grr... Get outta my way! Give me back Miyuki!

Now, really, do you expect me to simply hand
her over like that?

Miyuki! Open your eyes! Please, you have to
wake up!
What’s going on?! Can’t she hear us?!

Now, now, that’s enough shouting. Would you
all please just be quiet?

(What...is this? That aura of malice... It
feels even worse than before.)
(Am I just imagining that?)
Listen, Aoi...
Takuma, no! Stay away from her!
Huh?

This...this doesn’t make any sense. What’s
going on here?!
I...I don’t get it. What’s the problem?

I’m sensing the presence of countless enemies
coming from Plutomon.

These presences...could they be the Master’s
Kenzoku? Why do I sense them in Plutomon?
I don’t get it. What’s that mean?!
Eheh... Heheheheh!

It’s really quite simple. I’ve taken in all
the enemies that used to be here.

Mind, body, and soul... I’ve made every last
part of them a part of me, and now we’re one.
What?!

So you absorbed all the Master’s Kenzoku and
fused together with them?!
It’s unspeakable...

To take them in like that, mind, body, and
soul...

That would mean utter oblivion. Their souls
will never return. She’s annihilated them.

So that explains it. That eerie silence,
absent any trace of a soul.

Miyuki’s strange lack of response...
Plutomon! It’s all been your doing!!!

That’s funny. Why are you looking at me like
that? What are you so angry about?

Everyone I’ve taken in was an enemy who
wanted to kill me.

All I did was guide them back onto the right
path. I thought you’d be happy.
But... What about Miyuki?
Yes... What have you done to Miyuki?!

I haven’t done anything to her. Not yet,
anyway.

Then why’s she practically an empty shell?!
Explain that!

It’s true, I was fighting before you arrived,
but I never laid a finger on Miyuki.

She did everything she could to resist, you
know.

But...then she just collapsed. I’m sure she
must have been tired, the poor thing.

And then... Heheh... What do you think
happened next?

Don’t tell me... Her soul’s begun to fuse
with the Master?!
That was my conclusion as well.

But she’s not the only one to fuse with the
Master.
Huh?
There’s also Saki...
Urgh...
...and Shuuji...
No!
...and of course even Ryo!
They should all be part of the Master now!

So there’s no need to be so sad. Don’t you
see?
No, Aoi. No, you’re not making any sense.

Why, once I take on the Master’s power, we
can all be together again!

Then we’ll never be apart, and there won’t be
any more fighting or hurting each other.

There will be no pain, no sadness, no
suffering! We need never know tragedy again!
You know what that sounds like?

It’s paradise! It’s everything we humans have
been longing for from the beginning of time!

At last, the world will know harmony, peace,
and order! Then I can rest easy.

And you really think that’s the best way for
us to deal with this situation?
Of course. Don’t you see?

...I don’t. I don’t get it, and I don’t want
to.
That’s right. None of us wants that!

What about our promise? Weren’t we all
supposed to go back to our world together?
Takuma...

That’s right, Aoi! I want you to come back
with us!
Oh, Miu...
Aoi, please...

Heheh...are you asking me to become one with
the people from our world, too?
Huh?!

Well, you don’t have to worry. That was my
plan from the start!

Remember what I told you? Humans, monsters...
All are to become one with me!

Only it won’t be easy, even for me. I’ll have
to fuse with billions of people.
Aoi, what are you talking about?

But I’d hate to disappoint you all, and
I really would like to grant your request.

After all, it would mean the end of all
conflict, all suffering!

Thank you, Takuma, everyone. With your
support, I think I can actually do it!

I can bring an end to all suffering! I will
be the savior of both worlds!
No, Aoi, you’ve got it all wrong!
That doesn’t sound like a savior to me!

I can’t stand this! It hurts to see you like
this, Aoi!

Is this hopeless after all? We just can’t get
through to her?

Why, what’s wrong? What’s gotten into all of
you?

Aoi, please, open your eyes! Can’t you see
that none of us want things to be like that?!
You don’t want peace?

No, that’s not what I mean! Can’t you come
back to your senses?!
Why do you try and stop me?
Why won’t you listen?!

It’s so easy to criticize something, but if
that’s all you do, you’ll never move forward.

I hate it when people are selfish, when all
they do is complain and put everything on me!

Why is it always like this?! So what if I’m
class president? Why do only I get lectured?

It’s not like I ever wanted to be in charge!
I hate dealing with people! I can’t do it!

But that’s always how it turns out, whether
it’s in class, after school, or here!

Still, someone has to do the work, and if not
me then who? That’s why I do these things!
Uhh, Aoi? I’m...not sure I’m following you.

Takuma, it’s no use. That thing is no longer
the Aoi we knew. It’s just a monster...

...who annihilated countless Kenzoku and
plans to end Miyuki. That makes it our enemy!

If you wish to save this world, if you wish
to return to yours, we must defeat Plutomon!

You still don’t understand. All right, it’ll
be faster to demonstrate than explain anyway.
Uh oh, look out! Here she comes!
Takuma, get back! Leave this to us!

Don’t worry. Even if you don’t understand
now, all will be clear when we’re one.

The process might hurt a little, but it won’t
last long, so bear with me, okay?
You’ll not defeat us so easily!

That’s right! We have to protect our
partners!

I doubt resisting will do you any good, but
you’re welcome to try.

I can’t wait to fuse with you all once you’re
worn out. Now then, shall we get started?
